channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.2.3
item.description:
New Improved Plugin Repository, including search

New Improved Preferences, including an ability to change some of plugin's parameters

New Option to not run plugins in bash

New Custom shortcuts appear on menu items

New Support for milliseconds in refresh interval

New Plugins should remember position in the menu bar and work nicely with Bartender/Dozer/etc.

New User friendly alert for an unsupported folder for Plugins (i.e. /Applications or /Library)

Fixed Preferences and Plugin Repository can be opened in more than one window

Fixed Inconsistent menu title color when using 'reduce transparency' on Big Sur

Fixed SwiftBar should handle the sleep-wake cycle correctly

Fixed Proper dismiss for About Plugin pop-up
